description: The new LV 130 Cabrio based on the innovative Dalbello LV platform is the ultimate for freeriders who value outstanding downhill performance without having to sacrifice comfort, ease of handling and sustainability. The stiffest and most responsive model in the 130 Flex range combines the latest developments in ski boot technology in a package that has all you could ever wish for. The boot’s new 3 Density Wrap (3DWrap) is designed with Dalbello PuRE (Polyurethane Recycled Enforcement) technology and thanks to three different layers, it offers more efficient force transmission to the shell, comfort and an excellent fit – perfect for long days skiing. The Dalbello Cabrio platform with its 3-piece design allows progressive, responsive flex, harmonious damping and stable lateral and heel support for greater control during the descent. The ergonomically improved Pebax tongue with its innovative rib shape also makes it easier to get in and out thanks to greater mobility. In addition, handling is made easier thanks to the new Dynalock buckle that is part of a revised locking system, and to a new Powerband with quick release function. The LV 130 Cabrio also offers impressive sustainability: The entire inner boot is PVC-free and the outer layer is made of recycled textile and polyurethane.
name: Cabrio LV 130

specs.value: All Mountian, Big Mountain, Powder, Freeride
